@BadFoMo Okay, I'm home and can answer on you questions.
At first. Nibs watches when picarto creates a new record, automatically downloads it, converts it and upload on YouTube.
You know, this page wasn't in the original script.
It was actually a last minute addition.
I figured there should be more of a transition between the previous and next page, and I wanted Maren and Sythe to talk a little.
I mean, Maren's furious expression in the last panel is a thing of joy.

Then Nibs monitors the streams status and when the stream starts, she writes all the received data to the disk. But you need to manually convert this data. This is a backup copy in case picarto does not create record..
